fallback-src.description: The address that appears when the image fails to load
fallback-src.description_zh: 图片加载失败时显示的地址

img-props.description: The properties of the img element in the component
img-props.description_zh: 组件中 img 元素的属性

lazy.description: Whether to let the image enter the viewport and then load, use the property value that will be set to [HTMLImageElement.loading](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLImageElement/loading); Lazy loading can also be implemented with the 'intersection-observer-options' configuration
lazy.description_zh: 是否让图片进入视口再加载，单独使用将设置为[HTMLImageElement.loading](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLImageElement/loading) 的属性值；也可配合 `intersection-observer-options` 配置实现懒加载

intersection-observer-options.type: { root?: Element | Document | string | null, rootMargin?: string, threshold?: number | number[]; }
intersection-observer-options.description_zh: `lazy=true` 时 intersection observer 观测的配置

object-fit.description: The type of adaptation of the picture inside the container
object-fit.description_zh: 图片在容器内的的适应类型

preview-src.description: The image address of the preview image

preview-disabled.description: Whether to disable click image preview
preview-disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用单击图像预览

previewed-img-props.description: The properties of the img element when previewing the image
previewed-img-props.description_zh: 预览图片时 img 元素的属性

show-toolbar.description: Whether to display the bottom toolbar after the image is enlarged
show-toolbar.description_zh: 图片放大后是否展示底部工具栏

show-toolbar-tooltip.description: Whether or not to display toolbar prompts
show-toolbar-tooltip.description_zh: 是否展示工具栏的提示

events.name: error
events.description: A callback that is executed if the image fails to load
events.description_zh: 图片加载失败执行的回调

events.name: load
events.description: The callback that is executed after the image is loaded
events.description_zh: 图片加载完成执行的回调
